mapper.select: SELECT posts.id, posts.url, posts.title, posts.description, posts.keyword, posts.content, posts.top_image_title AS "topImageTitle", posts.top_image_url AS "topImageUrl", posts.top_image_alt AS "topImageAlt", posts.category_id AS "categoryId", posts.status_id AS "statusId", posts.updated, posts.delflg, categories.name AS "categoryName" FROM posts LEFT OUTER JOIN categories ON posts.category_id = categories.id WHERE posts.status_id = '8' AND posts.delflg = '0' ORDER BY updated DESC
